customSli.indicator:
timeseries series = avg(dt.synthetic.http.availability), 
           by:{ dt.entity.synthetic_location, dt.entity.http_check }, interval:1m

| filter dt.entity.synthetic_location == "{{ .extractedIDs.id_SYNTHETIC_LOCATION_0000000000000064 }}"      
| filter IN(dt.entity.http_check, {"{{ .extractedIDs.id_HTTP_CHECK_1313FB3056F81BBE }}","{{ .extractedIDs.id_HTTP_CHECK_DB55161EAA7A7B4F }}","{{ .extractedIDs.id_HTTP_CHECK_1334D771FF374E0C }}"})
| summarize { sli = min(series[]) }, by: { timeframe, interval }
